message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I believe it offers significant value, even beyond your initial assessment.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your position, but I can't go below $13,000. This product is priced competitively, and I'm confident it will benefit you greatly.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand your position and appreciate the competitive pricing. However, I am still unable to exceed my budget of $10,000 for this product. I hope we can find a solution that works for both of us.
